sentences.en: Acrasiomycota ( cellular slime molds ) A class of protoctists in the phylum Rhizopoda.
sentences.cn: 集胞粘菌门 ( 细胞状粘菌 ):根足亚纲的一类原生生物.

sentences.en: Angiosperms The flowering plants constituting by far the largest phylum ( Anthophyta or Angiospermophyta ) of vascular seed plants.
sentences.cn: 被子植物:由显花植物组成的最大的一门维管种子植物.

sentences.en: Basidiomycota ( basidiomycetes ) A phylum of the Fungi that includes the mushrooms and toadstools.
sentences.cn: 担子菌:包括蘑菇和毒菌在内的一门真菌.

sentences.en: Peacocks are classified in the phylum Chordata, subphylum Vertebrata , class Aves , order Galliformes, family Phasianidae.
sentences.cn: 孔雀被认为是脊索动物类,脊索动物亚门, 鸟类.

sentences.en: Small - middle size soil animals belong to 5 phylum, 6 class, 9 order, 7 famility. The dominant groups is Nematoda.
sentences.cn: 中小型 土壤动物5门6纲9目7科, 优势类群为线虫.

sentences.en: The category of phylum was added classification scheme later, as a hierarchical level just beneath kingdom.
sentences.cn: 至于门这个阶层,则在随后才加上, 被置于界这个层级的后面.

sentences.en: The mollusc phylum includes all soft - bodied animals without backbones.
sentences.cn: 软体动物门包括所有无脊椎的软体动物.

sentences.en: There are 76 grougs, 4359 Large - size soil animals that belongto 4 phylum, 8 class, 20 order, 48 famility.
sentences.cn: 大型土壤动物有76类, 4359只,隶属于4门 、 8纲 、 20目 、 48科.

sentences.en: Zygomycete Any fungus belonging to the phylum Zygomycota.
sentences.cn: 接合菌:从属于接合菌纲的所有真菌.

trans.tran_cn: （生物分类学上的）门，语群（比语系关系松散的一种语言）
trans.tran_en: one of the large groups into which scientists divide plants, animals, and languages
